nodes.text: During the Orinda campaign of 12 ABY, the Imperial Remnant won a battle in the Urce system. While the New Republic's Executor-class Star Dreadnought Lusankya was en route to the area in response to a string of Remnant victories, Head of State Gilad Pellaeon took his own Executor-class Star Dreadnought, the Reaper, to Urce and captured both the planet and a HoloNet relay.
